When you say the Z accel looks correct, are you getting around +9.8 on Z when the robot is standing?

If the expectation is for +9.8 on Z when the torso is upright, then it should be +9.8 on X when the robot is laying on its back, right? Here are some screenshots where you can see the orientation of the torso and the accelerations measured by the IMU. Let me know which ones still seem incorrect:
